ValidationRule.description: New Essential, Enhanced and Entrepreneur bundles can only be Global Discounts, no WIN or National Account
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( Enhanced_Package__c , Entrepreneur_Package__c , Essentials_Package__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(WIN_Check__c, 'WIN'), ISPICKVAL(WIN_Check__c, 'National Account'), ISPICKVAL( Discount2_Type__c , 'WIN'), ISPICKVAL( Discount2_Type__c , 'National Account')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: *** ONLY GLOBAL DISCOUNT ALLOWED ON THIS PACKAGE ***
